purpose: Assist developers in choosing and setting up AI agent frameworks by providing a structured starting point
principle: Utilizes a template-based approach to streamline the setup of AI agent frameworks
reusability: Offers a CLI tool for generating agent framework setups, intended to be extended and customized by developers
limitations: Primarily serves as a starting template; requires further customization for specific use cases
name: create-agent-app
description: Helping you select an AI agent framework
highlight: Guides developers in selecting and creating AI agent frameworks tailored to their needs
